attributes.action: Keep John Carroll Leisure Centre Open
attributes.additional_details:
John Carroll Leisure Centre is the last real community facility available in Radford, Nottingham. For decades it has served as place where children build the confidence they need to succeed and a sporting facility for under-funded schools. 

Our Labour City Council has squandered the city's cash on it's failed Robin Hood Energy investment and is forcing the poorest communities in the city to pay the price. 

We call on the council to properly invest in the centre and the government to intervene.
attributes.background:
We are calling upon the Government and Nottingham City Council to 
halt the closure of John Carroll Leisure Centre and provide proper funding for community facilities in the most deprived parts of the Nottingham.
